meta.content: We are a Preschool- 12th Grade District with 3 newly renovated locations. American International Academy provides high-quality, relevant and varied educational programs and opportunity for the intellectual, cultural, and personal growth for all stakeholders.
School | American International Academy | United States

We are a Preschool- 12th Grade District with 3 newly renovated locations. American International Academy provides high-quality, relevant and varied educational programs and opportunity for the intellectual, cultural, and personal growth for all stakeholders.

meta.name: google-site-verification

span.span: AIA COVID-19 CONTINUITY OF LEARNING PLAN
Students should be shown LOVE by experiencing great relationships with the school’s staff in a safe, nurturing, and needs fulfilling environment.
The school should provide a positive, enjoyable, and engaging educational experience that promotes LAUGHTER in the classroom.
Every student can LEARN and we do not accept failure.
